item.title: Years in review: 2018ish to July 2020
item.description: I started learning code and English in 2018 (maybe late 2017ish) to attend community college in Canada in September 2018. My learning journey so far can be divided into two phases: the “English and Code gives me headaches” phase (phase 1) and the “oh I am so lost” phase (phase 2). This post is about what I did during those phases and what I think I can improve. Phase 1: Learn the basics If my memory serves me right, my first attempt at the first freeCodeCamp project was around January 2018.
